Title: Goku's New Technique, Instant Movement! Special Training Staked on 3 Years from Now
Writer: Aya Matsui, Hiroshi Toda, Akira Toriyama
Actors: Masako Nozawa, Mayumi Tanaka, Hiromi Tsuru
Plot: Goku tells the amazing story of how he survived the destruction of Namek, and the heroic warriors begin their training for a looming showdown with the Androids!
